question: What leadership changes have coincided with a rise in data science hiring within companies that focus on AI technologies?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that focus on AI technologies. [CompanyTechStack]
Gather data on recent leadership changes within these companies. [CompanyManagementDetail]
Identify trends in data science hiring within these companies. [CompanyHiringDetail]
Analyze the correlation between leadership changes and data science hiring trends. [CompanyManagementDetail, CompanyHiringDetail]
